alert.note: Alert for Southern Brevard County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 12:14PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Indian River and southeastern Brevard Counties through 1245 PM EST... At 1214 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Indian Harbour Beach to 9 miles west of Fellsmere to near Blue Cypress Lake. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Sebastian, Satellite Beach and Fellsmere. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for east central Florida.
